mapper.select: select not_no ,not_title ,not_date from notice order by not_date desc limit 10;
select not_no ,not_title ,not_date from notice where not_date like concat(#{notDate},'%') order by not_no desc;

select not_no ,not_title ,not_date ,rownum from (select not_no, not_title, not_date, @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum from notice where (@rownum:=0)=0 and not_title like concat('%',#{notTitle},'%') order by not_no desc) as search having rownum >= (#{selectPage}-1)*10 + 1 and rownum <= #{selectPage} * 10;
SELECT not_no, not_title, not_date FROM notice where not_no between #{totalNumber} - ((#{selectPage} * 10)-1) and #{totalNumber} - ((#{selectPage}-1) * 10) order by not_no desc;
